title: [HELP] Account Suspension with no additional details.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So today I have come back from a week trip and I open up my League client, attempt to log in and I receive a message saying that I am suspended till the 12th of October and that I should check my email for additional details. I went and opened up my email, seeing no email sent in by Riot telling me why am I suspended. Can someone please help me out here and tell me what to do?

replies.body: Send in a support ticket at https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
I have sent one and i chose the option 'I have a question about riot games' and then I chose account --> transfer option and I've sent one but I don't know if that was the correct choice.

It should get to the appropriate department (Player Behaviour) regardless. Hang tight and you should receive a response; however, in the off-chance that you don't receive a response within 7 days (you should get a response before this anyway), please let me know and I'll try to get context behind this suspension for you.
Hello Wuks, it's been 2 days since I've made the support ticket and I have not received any response from Riot. It would be really great if you can find out for me the context of my suspension.
There's a ticket queue, and Riot Support will get to yours as soon as they can.
